settings.heading: PRODUCTION INFO
settings.content: NOTICE: There may be changes in some details shown in the product image when the actual product is produced. We always try our best to reproduce as many key details as possible, but there are some stylistic changes that may take place throughout the mock up and production process.

settings.title: Petition Campaign
settings.text: The petition is live for 30 days after launch date. Once that time period ends, if the petition is funded, the project enters into prototyping! If it is not fully funded, everyone who pledged will receive a full refund.

settings.title: Prototyping
settings.text: 2-4 weeks after petition. The petition product will be prototyped and developed along with the creator to bring to life the BEST version of your new product.

settings.title: Collectible Campaign
settings.text: 1-3 months after petition. The petition product is now a full-fledged collectible! We will launch the product for 2 weeks as a pre-order item for a limited time!

settings.title: Production
settings.text: 3-4 months after petition. We produce your product and get it ready to send to it's new home!

settings.title: Fulfillment
settings.text: 4-5 months after petition. We send your product to you so you can keep it safe!

settings.custom_liquid:
<script type="text/javascript">
var _learnq = _learnq || [];
function addedToCart() {
  fetch(`${window.location.origin}/cart.js`)
  .then(res => res.clone().json().then(data => {
    var cart = {
      total_price: data.total_price/100,
      $value: data.total_price/100,
      total_discount: data.total_discount,
      original_total_price: data.original_total_price/100,
      items: data.items
    }
    if (item !== 'undefined') {
      cart = Object.assign(cart, item)
    }
    _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', cart])
  }))
} 
(function (ns, fetch) {
  ns.fetch = function() {
    const response = fetch.apply(this, arguments);
    response.then(res => {
      if (`${window.location.origin}/cart/add.js`
      	.includes(res.url)) {
        	addedToCart()
      }
    });
    return response
  }
}(window, window.fetch))
$(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, request, settings){
  if(settings.url == "/cart/add.js"){
      addedToCart()
  }
})</script>
